animeTitle: Wo Jian Qile Yi Di Shuxing
otherNames: I Picked Up An Attribute, Attribute Collection, 我捡起了一地属性
synopsis: Feng Xia, a completely hardworking game player, travels through time and space. With his power, attributes, and strategies learned from the games he played before, he can beat his enemies and get their Light Masses of Attributes. Besides, he also meets all kinds of beauties along his way... His enemies laugh: "My martial arts are invincible!" Feng Xia just beats them and absorbs their Light Masses. "Indeed. But sorry, it's my martial arts now!"
